title: Tran - comites pellantur amari - Hugh Primas 6

content.question: In the sentence, ut, redeunte pari, comites pellantur amari is translated

choices.label: your unpleasant companions are driven away as your partner returns
as your unpleasant companions are driving away your returning partner
so that your unpleasant companions may be driven to your returning partner
so that your unpleasant companions may be driven away when your partner returns

content.answer: so that your unpleasant companions may be driven away when your partner returns

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
